member.name: F:CookPopularControl.Tools.Interop.InteropValues.WindowPositionFlags.SWP_ASYNCWINDOWPOS
member.summary: If the calling thread and the thread that owns the window are attached to different input queues, the system posts the request to the thread that owns the window. This prevents the calling thread from blocking its execution while other threads process the request.

member.name: F:CookPopularControl.Tools.Interop.InteropValues.WindowPositionFlags.SWP_DEFERERASE
member.summary: Prevents generation of the WM_SYNCPAINT message.

member.name: F:CookPopularControl.Tools.Interop.InteropValues.WindowPositionFlags.SWP_DRAWFRAME
member.summary: Draws a frame (defined in the window's class description) around the window.

member.name: F:CookPopularControl.Tools.Interop.InteropValues.WindowPositionFlags.SWP_FRAMECHANGED
member.summary: Applies new frame styles set using the SetWindowLong function. Sends a WM_NCCALCSIZE message to the window, even if the window's size is not being changed. If this flag is not specified, WM_NCCALCSIZE is sent only when the window's size is being changed.

member.name: F:CookPopularControl.Tools.Interop.InteropValues.WindowPositionFlags.SWP_NOACTIVATE
member.summary: Does not activate the window. If this flag is not set, the window is activated and moved to the top of either the topmost or non-topmost group (depending on the setting of the hWndInsertAfter parameter).

member.name: F:CookPopularControl.Tools.Interop.InteropValues.WindowPositionFlags.SWP_NOCOPYBITS
member.summary: Discards the entire contents of the client area. If this flag is not specified, the valid contents of the client area are saved and copied back into the client area after the window is sized or repositioned.

member.name: F:CookPopularControl.Tools.Interop.InteropValues.WindowPositionFlags.SWP_NOMOVE
member.summary: Retains the current position (ignores X and Y parameters).

member.name: F:CookPopularControl.Tools.Interop.InteropValues.WindowPositionFlags.SWP_NOOWNERZORDER
member.summary: Does not change the owner window's position in the Z order.

member.name: F:CookPopularControl.Tools.Interop.InteropValues.WindowPositionFlags.SWP_NOREDRAW
member.summary: Does not redraw changes. If this flag is set, no repainting of any kind occurs. This applies to the client area, the nonclient area (including the title bar and scroll bars), and any part of the parent window uncovered as a result of the window being moved. When this flag is set, the application must explicitly invalidate or redraw any parts of the window and parent window that need redrawing.

member.name: F:CookPopularControl.Tools.Interop.InteropValues.WindowPositionFlags.SWP_NOSENDCHANGING
member.summary: Prevents the window from receiving the WM_WINDOWPOSCHANGING message.

member.name: F:CookPopularControl.Tools.Interop.InteropValues.WindowPositionFlags.SWP_NOSIZE
member.summary: Retains the current size (ignores the cx and cy parameters).

member.name: F:CookPopularControl.Tools.Interop.InteropValues.WindowPositionFlags.SWP_NOZORDER
member.summary: Retains the current Z order (ignores the hWndInsertAfter parameter).

member.summary: 获取屏幕 PDI 缩放系数。

member.summary: 获取屏幕的每英寸水平逻辑像素数（DPI）。

member.name: M:CookPopularControl.Tools.Screenshot.GetDpiY
member.summary: 获取屏幕的每英寸垂直逻辑像素数（DPI）。
member.returns: 返回屏幕的每英寸垂直逻辑像素数（DPI）。

member.returns: 返回一个包含屏幕快照的 GDI+ 位图对象。

member.name: M:CookPopularControl.Tools.Screenshot.GetResolution
member.summary: 获取当前屏幕的原始分辨率。
member.returns: 返回当前屏幕的原始分辨率。

member.name: M:CookPopularControl.Tools.Screenshot.Compression(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Int64,System.Boolean)
member.summary: 使用 JPEG 图像质量级别来压缩当前 GDI+ 位图。
member.param: 当前 GDI+ 位图对象。
指定 JPEG 图像质量级别（0 ~ 100）。
若操作成功，则立即释放当前 GDI+ 位图对象（默认为 false）。
member.returns: 返回一个已压缩的 GDI+ 位图对象。

member.name: M:CookPopularControl.Tools.Screenshot.ToBitmapSource(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Boolean)
member.summary: 基于当前 GDI+ 位图创建一个托管且冻结的 。
member.param: 当前 GDI+ 位图对象。
若操作成功，则立即释放当前 GDI+ 位图对象（默认为 false）。
member.returns: 返回一个托管且冻结的 对象。

member.summary: 提供一些正则表达式列表

member.name: F:CookPopularControl.Tools.Windows.ValidationRules.RegularPatterns.LetterPattern
member.remarks: 由26个英文字母组成的字符串

member.name: F:CookPopularControl.Tools.Windows.ValidationRules.RegularPatterns.DigitalAndLetterPattern
member.summary: 只包含字母和数字规则

member.name: F:CookPopularControl.Tools.Windows.ValidationRules.RegularPatterns.DigitalAndUpperLowerLetterPattern
member.summary: 只包含大小写字母和数字规则

member.name: F:CookPopularControl.Tools.Windows.ValidationRules.RegularPatterns.DigitalOrLetterPattern
member.summary: 数字或英文字母组成的规则

member.name: F:CookPopularControl.Tools.Windows.ValidationRules.RegularPatterns.DigitalOrLetterOrLinePattern
member.summary: 数字、英文字母或下划线组成的规则

member.name: F:CookPopularControl.Tools.Windows.ValidationRules.RegularPatterns.Password1Pattern
member.remarks: 必须含有数字与字母，且不能包含中文与空格

member.name: F:CookPopularControl.Tools.Windows.ValidationRules.RegularPatterns.Password2Pattern
member.remarks: 必须含有字母与数字,其它任意字符亦可

member.name: F:CookPopularControl.Tools.Windows.ValidationRules.RegularPatterns.Password3Pattern
member.remarks: 必须含有大小字母与数字,其它任意字符亦可

member.name: F:CookPopularControl.Tools.Windows.ValidationRules.RegularPatterns.IDCardPattern
member.summary: 身份证号(15位、18位数字)规则
